dialogue.htmlContent:
You find yourself walking through the area of Dominion known as 'Nightlife', which is currently fully living up to its name. The bright colours of neon signs join with the soft glow of lampposts to illuminate the street before you, which is packed with crowds of revellers. Many of these people are quite clearly drunk, and noisily shout and make lewd comments at those around them as they stagger between the many clubs and bars that fill this area.

Every now and then, you pass couples, and sometimes even groups, who have given in to their alcohol-fuelled lust and are publicly having sex with one another. The enforcers who patrol this area don't seem to care one bit about these lewd displays, and sometimes even to stop to watch the lewd displays in front of them.

Looking past these crowds to the establishments which have attracted them, you see all sorts of different bars and clubs open for business. The vast majority of them, however, seem to either be completely full, or to have massive queues trailing out into the streets.

Out of all the establishments that you pass, the only one which you'd have any hope of getting into tonight is the nightclub, 'The Watering Hole'. Although it looks to be just as good as any of the other clubs in this area, it's positioned near the far end of the street, which makes it a little less popular with the crowds of casual clubbers.

You find yourself walking through the area of Dominion known as 'Nightlife', which is currently deserted due to the ongoing arcane storm. The bright colours of neon signs join with the soft glow of lampposts to illuminate the empty street before you.

While all the bars and clubs that fill this area are still open for business, the vast majority of them seem to already be completely full. The only place which looks to still have some room left is the nightclub, 'The Watering Hole'.

You find yourself walking through the area of Dominion known as 'Nightlife', which, due to the fact that it's currently day time, is all but deserted. The clubs and bars that line the streets are all closed, and the only people walking about in this area are those that are on their way to other parts of the city.

Reading one of the club's signs as you pass, you see that all of the establishments in this area open at seven in the evening, and close at five the following morning. If you wanted to visit one of the clubs or bars, you'd have to come back at that time.

You find yourself walking through the area of Dominion known as 'Nightlife', which, due to the fact that there's an ongoing arcane storm, is completely deserted. The clubs and bars that line the streets are all closed, and there isn't a single non-demon in sight.

Reading one of the club's signs as you pass, you see that all of the establishments in this area open at seven in the evening, and close at five the following morning. If you wanted to visit one of the clubs or bars, you'd have to come back at that time.

[style.italicsBad(All descriptions are placeholders. Full descriptions will be in a hotfix!)]

There's a winding queue inside the entrance hall to the nightclub. At the front of the queue, a pair of imposing zebra-boys are standing guard.

The larger of the two zebra-boys sees you enter, and calls out, [jules.speech(Hey! You at the back! You can skip the queue if you want!)]

Sensing that something's not quite right, you raise an eyebrow, but before you can reply, the zebra-boy continues, [jules.speech(All you've got to do is come over here and suck my cock!)]

The other zebra-boy sighs and crosses his arms, before turning to his companion and berating him, [genericMale.speech(Come on Jules, knock it off. Kruger's already warned you about scaring customers off.)]

It looks like you'll have to wait in the queue to get into the club, which will take about half an hour. Then again, you could always take Jules up on his offer...

[style.italicsBad(All descriptions are placeholders. Full descriptions will be in a hotfix!)]

Once again you find yourself stepping into the entrance hall of the nightclub, 'The Watering Hole'. There's a winding queue leading up to an interior pair of doors.

The same two zebra-boys are standing guard, and as Jules sees you enter, he calls out, [jules.speech(Hey, it's you again! You gonna suck my cock this time, or what?)]

It looks like you'll have to wait in the queue to get into the club, which will take about half an hour. Then again, you could always take Jules up on his offer...
You find yourself standing beside the pair of doors that lead back out to the club's entrance hall. From here, you could choose to take your leave, or turn around and head back into the club.

[pc.speech(Sure, I don't mind doing that!)] you happily call out, before starting to make your way towards the large zebra-boy.

[jules.speech(Hah! It actually worked! I told you it would!)] Jules happily states to his partner, before turning back towards you. [jules.speech(Go on then, get down on your knees.)]

Doing as you're told, you drop down onto your knees in front of Jules, and, right in front of all the people in the queue, you prepare to suck his cock in order to get immediate entry to the club.

Deciding that you're definitely not going to suck Jules's cock, you step forwards and take your place at the back of the queue.

It takes about thirty minutes before you're standing before the zebra-boy bouncers. After just a minute more, Jules stands to one side to let you pass. [jules.speech(It'd have been a lot faster if you'd just got on with giving me a blowjob. Whatever. Go on in.)]

Stepping through the double doors, you enter the club proper. The interior is absolutely packed with people of all different races. The chatter, laughter, and shouting from the crowd is joined by loud, bassy background music, making it very hard to make out what anyone's saying unless you're standing right beside them.

The interior looks to have an 'African safari' type theme to it, and although the lights are very dim, you can clearly see zebra-stripes, leopard-spots, and savannah-style trees painted onto the walls.

Having finished sucking his cock, you stand up in front of Jules, who grins at you as he steps to one side in order to let you pass. [jules.speech(Good job slut. Go on in, I'm sure you'll find plenty more cocks to service inside.)]

Stepping through the double doors, you enter the club proper. The interior is absolutely packed with people of all different races. The chatter, laughter, and shouting from the crowd is joined by loud, bassy background music, making it very hard to make out what anyone's saying unless you're standing right beside them.

The interior looks to have an 'African safari' type theme to it, and although the lights are very dim, you can clearly see zebra-stripes, leopard-spots, and savannah-style trees painted onto the walls.

The interior of 'The Watering Hole' is absolutely packed with people of all different races. The chatter, laughter, and shouting from the crowd is joined by loud, bassy background music, making it very hard to make out what anyone's saying unless you're standing right beside them.

The interior looks to have an 'African safari' type theme to it, and although the lights are very dim, you can clearly see zebra-stripes, leopard-spots, and savannah-style trees painted onto the walls.

You lean in towards [npc.name], and, over the background noise, spend the next few minutes chatting with [npc.herHim]. [npc.She] seems to appreciate you taking the time to get to know [npc.herHim] a little better.

You step up close to [npc.name], and, in order to make yourself heard over the background noise, lean in towards [npc.herHim]. You spend the next few minutes flirting with [npc.herHim] and complimenting [npc.her] appearance. From [npc.her] laughter and playful responses, you can tell that you're making a good impression on [npc.herHim].

Stepping up to [npc.name], you lean forwards and press your [pc.lips+] against [npc.hers]. [npc.She] immediately leans back into you, pushing [npc.her] [npc.tongue] into your mouth as [npc.she] happily returns your kiss. You spend the next few minutes making out with one another, before stepping back and catching your breath.

Stepping up to [npc.name], you lean forwards and try to kiss [npc.herHim]. Before your [pc.lips] can find their target, [npc.name] pulls away with an astonished look of disapproval on [npc.her] face.

[npc.speech(Hey! Watch it!)] [npc.she] shouts, frowning at you and backing off a little.

Leaning in against [npc.name], you place your [pc.hands] on [npc.her] [npc.hips], before working your way down between [npc.her] [npc.legs]. As you start groping and fondling [npc.her] body, [npc.name] lets out [npc.a_moan+], before leaning into you and [npc.moaning] into your [pc.ear], [npc.speech(~Aah!~ Yeah, keep it going!)]

You spend the next few minutes fondling and groping one another, before finally stepping back and wondering what to do next.

Leaning in against [npc.name], you place your [pc.hands] on [npc.her] [npc.hips], before trying to work your way down between [npc.her] [npc.legs]. [npc.She] instantly pulls away in response to your exploratory movements, and with an angry expression on [npc.her] face, [npc.she] shouts out over the background racket, [npc.speech(What the fuck?! Keep your [pc.hands] to yourself!)]

You step back, giving [npc.name] some space and letting [npc.her] cool off.

Deciding that [npc.name] isn't all you were hoping [npc.she]'d be, you call out over the background noise of the club, [pc.speech(I've got to head off for a while, maybe I'll catch you later?)]

[npc.Name] seems a little deflated, but as you move away from [npc.herHim], [npc.she] shrugs [npc.her] shoulders and moves off into the crowd.
There are so many different sorts of people in the club that you're sure of being able to find the type of person you want. First you need to decide what gender you'd like your partner to be...
Having narrowed your search down, you now need to decide what race your partner should be...

Having decided upon the sort of person you'd like to find, you set about searching through the crowds of people. Before long, you catch sight of [npc.a_raceFull(true)] standing all alone; just the sort you were after! Walking up to [npc.herHim], you introduce yourself as [pc.name], and get the name '[npc.name]' in return. After chatting to one another for a minute, [npc.she] seems to be happy to follow you around.

With your new partner in tow, you wonder where you should head to next...

Around the edges of the club, there are several jungle-themed seating areas. The enclosure is made up of numerous small, semi-enclosed booths, each one surrounded by fake plants and wooden fencing. In each of these booths, a semi-circular leather sofa surrounds a clean wooden table. Most of these sofas are occupied by couples, who are either talking or making out with one another.

This area would be of use if you had someone to sit with. If you were to find someone out in the main area of the club, you could come back and sit with them in one of these booths.

Around the edges of the club, there are several jungle-themed seating areas. The enclosure is made up of numerous small, semi-enclosed booths, each one surrounded by fake plants and wooden fencing. In each of these booths, a semi-circular leather sofa surrounds a clean wooden table. Most of these sofas are occupied by couples, who are either talking or making out with one another.

Leading [npc.name] over to an empty booth, you sit down with [npc.herHim], before leaning forwards over the table and starting to chat...

Lifting your [pc.foot] up under the table, you run it up the length of one of [npc.namePos] [npc.legs]. [npc.She] lets out a laugh, before reciprocating your gesture and using [npc.her] [npc.feet] to play with your free one.

Continuing to lift your [pc.foot] up, you gently start to press into [npc.namePos] groin, causing [npc.herHim] to let out [npc.a_moan+]. Spreading [npc.her] [npc.legs], [npc.she] encourages you to continue, and for the next few minutes, you continue playing with [npc.herHim] under the table.

Lifting your [pc.foot] up under the table, you run it up the length of one of [npc.namePos] [npc.legs]. [npc.She] lets out a shocked cry, before reaching down under the table and pushing your [pc.foot] away.

[npc.speech(Keep your [pc.feet] to yourself!)] [npc.she] angrily shouts, before crossing [npc.her] [npc.arms] and leaning back into the sofa.

Sliding around on the sofa, you lean in against [npc.name], making [npc.herHim] let out a little [npc.moan]. Taking that as a sign of consent, you lift yourself up and sit in [npc.her] lap, before leaning forwards and giving [npc.herHim] a passionate kiss.

[npc.She] responds by pulling you into [npc.herHim], and, with [npc.a_moan+], starts having sex with you...
Sliding around on the sofa, you lean in against [npc.name], which causes [npc.herHim] to let out a frustrated sigh. Pushing you away, [npc.she] scolds, [npc.speech(Keep to your own side!)]

Sliding around on the sofa, you lean in against [npc.name], making [npc.herHim] let out a little [npc.moan]. Taking that as a sign of consent, you wrap your [pc.arms] around [npc.herHim] and pull [npc.herHim] into your lap, before leaning forwards and giving [npc.herHim] a passionate kiss.

[npc.She] responds by leaning down into you, and, with [npc.a_moan+], [npc.she] lets you take charge as you start having sex with [npc.herHim]...
Sliding around on the sofa, you lean in against [npc.name], which causes [npc.herHim] to let out a frustrated sigh. Pushing you away, [npc.she] scolds, [npc.speech(Keep to your own side!)]
Having had a good time with [npc.name], you disentangle yourself from [npc.her] clutches.

Deciding that [npc.name] isn't all you were hoping [npc.she]'d be, you call out over the background noise of the club, [pc.speech(I've got to head off for a while, maybe I'll catch you later?)]

[npc.Name] seems a little deflated, but as you move away from [npc.herHim], [npc.she] shrugs [npc.her] shoulders and stand up, before moving off into the crowd.

You lean in over the table towards [npc.name], and, over the background noise, spend the next few minutes chatting with [npc.herHim]. [npc.She] seems to appreciate you taking the time to get to know [npc.herHim] a little better.

You slide around on the sofa to get a little closer to [npc.name], and, in order to make yourself heard over the background noise, lean in towards [npc.herHim]. You spend the next few minutes flirting with [npc.herHim] and complimenting [npc.her] appearance. From [npc.her] laughter and playful responses, you can tell that you're making a good impression on [npc.herHim].
The bar is staffed by lionesses and zebra-girls. One of the lionesses looks to be in charge. She's the one nearest to where you're standing, so if you want to get served, you could call out to her.
The bar is staffed by lionesses and zebra-girls. Kalahari is the one nearest to where you're standing, so if you want to get served, you could call out to her.
The lioness is introduced as Kalahari. She is the senior barmaid. She smiles and leans forwards over the bar.
You talk to [npc.name] at the bar.
You flirt with [npc.name] at the bar.
You lean in to [npc.name] and kiss [npc.herHim] at the bar.
You lean in to [npc.name] and try to kiss [npc.herHim] at the bar. [npc.She] pulls away and tells you to stop.
You grope and feel up [npc.name].
You try to grope and feel up [npc.name]. [npc.She] pulls away and angrily tells you to stop.
Having had enough of [npc.name], you leave [npc.herHim] at the bar.
You get Kalahari's attention. She smiles and leans forwards over the bar.
You talk with Kalahari for a little while. Although there are customers waiting, she ignores them a little in order to continue chatting with you.
You flirt with Kalahari for a little while. Although there are customers waiting, she gets caught up in flirting back with you, and ignores them.

You ask Kalahari if she's going to have a break soon, and if she'd like to spend it with you. She answers in the affirmative to both of your questions.

Kalahari leads you to VIP area. The lion bouncers stand to one side and let the two of you in. Kalahari introduces you to Kruger, who is the owner of the club. It's revealed here that Kalahari and Kruger used to be a couple, but are no longer together. Kruger seems friendly enough, if a little dismissive.

You and Kalahari sit in an unoccupied booth together, out of sight of Kruger and the bouncers.

You ask Kalahari if she's going to have a break soon, and if she'd like to spend it with you. She answers in the affirmative to both of your questions.

Kalahari leads you to VIP area. The lion bouncers stand to one side and let the two of you in. You see Kruger again, who seems friendly enough, if a little dismissive.

You and Kalahari sit in an unoccupied booth together, out of sight of Kruger and the bouncers.
You talk to Kalahari for a little while.
You flirt with Kalahari for a little while.
You lean in against Kalahari and kiss her. She happily responds in kind, and the two of you make out with one another for a little while.
You lean in against Kalahari and start to grope and feel her up. She starts softly moaning and panting, leaning in over your shoulder and begging you to continue.
You pull Kalahari into your lap and start having sex with her.
You slide into Kalahari's lap and start having sex with her.
After sex with Kalahari.
You and Kalahari return to the bar.
Kalahari has used up her break time. You both return to the bar.
VIP area. You see Kruger, and the lion bouncers recognise you from before, allowing you in.
VIP area. A pair of lion bouncers block the way, and don't let you in.
You talk with Kruger for a while.
You flirt with with Kruger.
You lean in towards Kruger, and he dominantly takes hold of your head and pulls you into a kiss.
You slide up next to Kruger. Taking the hint, he slides one of his hands down between your legs, while simultaneously groping your chest.
You slide into Kruger's lap and start having sex with him.
You end sex with Kruger.
You tell Kruger that you have to go.

The middle of the club is occupied by a large dance floor, which is currently occupied by a huge crowd of revellers. It's from here that the bassy background music originates, and, looking up towards the ceiling, you see a series of arcane-powered loudspeakers, which are clearly responsible for blaring out the generic club music.

Although there are many people on the dance floor, there's still some space left. You could walk forwards and start to dance if you wanted to.
You dance for a while by yourself.
You dance with [npc.name] for a little while.

You lean forwards and kiss [npc.name]. [npc.She] happily throws [npc.her] [npc.arms] around you and returns your kiss, pushing [npc.her] tongue into your mouth and [npc.moaning] as the crowd continues to dance around you.
You lean forwards and try to kiss [npc.name]. [npc.She] backs away and looks annoyed.
You lean in against [npc.name] and start groping and feeling [npc.herHim] up. [npc.She] happily leans in against you, [npc.moaning] into your [pc.ear] and begging for you to continue.
You lean in against [npc.name] and try to grope and feel [npc.herHim] up. [npc.She] moves away and frowns angrily at you.
You decide that you've had enough of [npc.name], and leave [npc.herHim] dancing on the dance floor.

The club's toilets are very large and spacious, with at least twenty individual stalls running down the left-hand side. Opposite these, sinks and mirrors provide a place for the club's revellers to clean themselves.
You and [npc.name] enter one of the stalls, ready to have sex...
You and [npc.name] end sex.
You try to get [npc.name] to enter one of the stalls and have sex, but [npc.she] angrily pushes you away, shouting, [npc.speech(I'm not going to fuck you in a toilet!)]
You use the toilet and freshen up at the sinks.
